name: Im Yours
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
Song: I'm Yours
Artist: Jason Mraz

I watched him play this so im quite sure bout it!
This is the best easy way to play this song!
It has this nice reggae beat, fun to play!
I took it from the higher A to get the semi-harmonics sound!
No Capo
Original key is B (capo 2nd fret) but i made it lower coz its harder!
So here goes...


    [ch]A[/ch]   [ch]E[/ch]  [ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]  [ch]D7[/ch]* [ch]C#m[/ch]  [ch]Bm[/ch]
E|--5---7---9---10--10--9---7--||
A|--5---7---10--10--13--9---7--||
D|--6---9---11--11--11--9---7--||
G|--7---9---11--12--10--11--9--||
B|--7---7---9---12--12--11--9--||
E|--5---7---9---10--10--9---7--||


[Verse]

     [ch]A[/ch]
Well you done done me in, you bet I felt it
   [ch]E[/ch]
I tried to be chill but you're so hot that I melted,
  [ch]F#m[/ch]
I fell right through the cracks,
[ch]D[/ch]
And now I'm tryin to get back....
            [ch]A[/ch]
Before the cool done run out, I'll be givin it my bestest
      [ch]E[/ch]
And nothing's going to stop me but divine intervention
    [ch]F#m[/ch]
I reckon its again my turn,
    [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]D7[/ch]*
To win some or learn some....


[Chorus 1]

[ch]A[/ch]               [ch]E[/ch]
But I wont hesitate
            [ch]F#m[/ch]
No more, no more
            [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]D7[/ch]*    [ch]A[/ch]---[ch]E[/ch]--[ch]F#m[/ch]---[ch]D[/ch]----[ch]D7[/ch]*
It can not wait, I'm yours


[Verse 2]

[ch]A[/ch]                                   [ch]E[/ch]
Well open up your mind and see like me
                                 [ch]F#m[/ch]
open up your plans & then your free
                                     [ch]D[/ch]
look into your heart and you'll find love love love
[ch]A[/ch]                                                          [ch]E[/ch]
Listen to the music of the moment come and sing/dance with me
                    [ch]F#m[/ch]
We're just one big family
                                       [ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]D7[/ch]*
And it's our God-forsaken right to be loved loved loved loved loved

(repeat Chorus except last word)

sure..


[Chorus 2]

            [ch]A[/ch]             [ch]E[/ch]
There's no need to complicate
              [ch]F#m[/ch]
Our time is short
             [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]D7[/ch]*
This is our fate i'm yours..


[Adlib]

 [ch]Do[/ch] [ch]A[/ch]-[ch]E[/ch]-[ch]F#m[/ch]-[ch]C#m[/ch]-[ch]Bm[/ch]--[ch]D[/ch]-[ch]D7[/ch]*   x2

3rd Verse (Same as other Verses)

(Chorus 1 & 2)

that's it!
enjoy!
please rate this, i worked hard for this...

content.text:
Tune down 1/2 step to match the recording.


[Intro]
[ch]C[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]Am[/ch]  [ch]F[/ch]

[Verse]
      [ch]C[/ch]
Well, you done done me an' you bet I felt it.
  [ch]G[/ch]
I tried to be chill, but you're so hot that I melted.
  [ch]Am[/ch]
I fell right through the cracks.
        [ch]F[/ch]
Now I'm trying to get back.

[ch]C[/ch]                                                   [ch]G[/ch]
Before the cool done run out, I'll be giving it my bestest,
                       [ch]Am[/ch]
And nothing's gonna stop me but divine intervention.
                                      [ch]F[/ch]
I reckon it's again my turn
                     [ch]D7/F#[/ch]
To win some or learn some.

[Chorus]
    [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]
But I won't hesitate no more, no more.
          [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
It cannot wait, I'm yours.
    [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]Am[/ch]
Mm, mm, hmm, mm...
                       [ch]F[/ch]
Hey, hey-ey, hey, hey, hey...

[Verse]
[ch]C[/ch]                                    [ch]G[/ch]
Well, open up your mind and see like me.
                                     [ch]Am[/ch]
Open up your plans and, damn, you're free.
                                     [ch]F[/ch]
Look into your heart and you'll find love, love, love, love.

[ch]C[/ch]                                                   [ch]G[/ch]
Listen to the music of the moment; people dance and sing.
                       [ch]Am[/ch]
We're just one big family.
                                      [ch]F[/ch]
And it's our god forsaken right to be loved,
                     [ch]D7/F#[/ch]
Loved, loved, loved, loved.

[Chorus]
   [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]
So I won't hesitate no more, no more.
          [ch]F[/ch]
It cannot wait, I'm sure.
           [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
There's no need to complicate.
            [ch]Am[/ch]
Our time is short.
            [ch]F[/ch]
This is our fate, I'm yours.
[ch]C[/ch]       [ch]G/B[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]
Tuch-tu...
               [ch]F[/ch]
Skooch on over closer, dear,
                       [ch]D7/F#[/ch]
And I will nibble your ear.

[Interlude]
|[ch]C[/ch]   [ch]G/B[/ch]  |[ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]   |[ch]F[/ch]       |[ch]D7/F#[/ch]   |

[Verse]
                   [ch]C[/ch]
I've been spending way too long checking my tongue in the mirror
    [ch]G[/ch]
And bending over backwards just to try to see it clearer.
    [ch]Am[/ch]
But my breath fogged up the glass,
         [ch]F[/ch]
And so I drew a new face and I laughed.
  [ch]C[/ch]
I guess what I'll be saying is there ain't no better reason
   [ch]G[/ch]
To rid yourself of vanities and just go with the seasons.
[ch]Am[/ch]
It's what we aim to do.
    [ch]F[/ch]
Our name is our virtue.

[Chorus/Outro]
    [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]
But I won't hesitate no more, no more.
          [ch]F[/ch]
It cannot wait, I'm yours.
[ch]C[/ch]                              [ch]G[/ch]
Open up your mind and see like me.
                                     [ch]Am[/ch]
Open up your plans and, damn, you're free.
                                     [ch]F[/ch]
Look into your heart and you'll find that the sky is yours.
   [ch]C[/ch]
So please don't, please don't, please don't...
           [ch]G[/ch]
There's no need to complicate.
           [ch]Am[/ch]
'Cause our time is short.
                              [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]D7/F#[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]Am[/ch] [ch]F[/ch]
This, oh this, oh this is our fate. I'm yours.
